reporting-org.narrative: The William and Flora Hewlett Foundation

title.narrative: "for research and capacity building for sustainable power sector in India"

description.narrative: "This grant will support the Prayas Energy Group in its work on increasing the share of renewable energy in India, along with exploring the implications of more end-use electrification on cleaning up the power system. Prayas works with both national and state regulators, providing technical assistance and capacity building to lead to a cleaner, lower-cost power system. Prayas has been a long-term core grantee of the Climate Initiative’s strategic priorities in India. (Substrategy: India National Policy)"
